<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Different Worlds](/Feats.aspx?ID=923) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
ability to select ancestry feats from multiple ancestries

</column>

---

Your separate experiences in different societies have evolved into entirely separate lives. Create a second identity for yourself with a different name, history, and background. This identity must correspond to one of the ancestries whose ancestry feats you can select. You gain the trained proficiency rank in the Lore skill from the second background you chose (but you don’t gain any of the background’s other benefits), and you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks when making a statement that would be true of your second identity or when disguising yourself as your second identity.

<title level="2">Lacunafex Lore</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 72</row>

If the PCs earn Mialari Docur's trust and prove their worth by defeating the Scarlet Triad, she rewards them by granting them access to several feats and spells she and her students have developed over the years.

**Related Feats**: [Reveal Machinations](/Feats.aspx?ID=924), [Secret Speech](/Feats.aspx?ID=925), [Silver's Refrain](/Feats.aspx?ID=926), [Tweak Appearances](/Feats.aspx?ID=927)
